biotools.summary: GENBMAP (Genetical Bandwith Mapping) is a software for the study of the spatial genetic structure. It was developped by Alain Cercueil, O. Fran?ois and S. Manel. The method is essentially descriptive, and allows an user to analyze genotypes and geographic coordinates simultaneously through a two dimensional graphical representation. GenBMAP provides a basis for the interpretation of the genetic structure of a population.
